original_title: Alois Brunner, Le Bourreau de Drancy
overview: Alois Brunner, member of the Nazi Party and SS officer, is particularly known in France for having directed in the most brutal and perverse way the camp of Drancy from where he sent to the death camps, more than 20,000 Jews, a third of the Jews arrested in our country, sometimes with the complicity of the French authorities.
title: Alois Brunner, Le Bourreau de Drancy
